lead_paragraph: While Petrobras is heavily into the deep-water business, its technical prowess at ferreting out hydrocarbons trapped in the ocean is world class.
snippet: While Petrobras is heavily into the deep-water business, its technical prowess at ferreting out hydrocarbons trapped in the ocean is world class.

headline.main: Investors Are Wary of Petrobras Sale
headline.seo: Investors Are Wary of Petrobras Stock Sale

byline.original: By ROB COX and CHRISTOPHER SWANN
